title: THE HAUNTED EFFECTS PACK 2 : DARK VOICES
description: “Haunt Their Ears - Dark Voices Unleashed” Pack 2
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


**Without any repeated sounds from our "Dark Voices Pack 1," we proudly present "Dark Voices Pack 2"** from our "The Haunted Effects" series. This new collection boasts an even larger array of vocal effects. **Embark on an auditory odyssey** where the grandeur of epic shouts and roars meets the subtle chill of the supernatural. Designed for game developers, this collection is a veritable powerhouse of vocal sound effects, crafted to infuse your projects with the darkest calls and the raw intensity of the human voice.


The sounds are bold and commanding, each one capable of standing alone as a focal point in a pivotal scene or blending seamlessly into the background of an expansive world. The slightly scary undertone adds depth, making these sounds perfect for moments of tension and excitement.
technicalDetails:
Sounds are categorized into folders according to there lengths i.e.,

SHORT LENGTHS - Up to 3 Seconds Long (261 Sounds)

MEDIAN LENGTHS - 4 to 5 Seconds Long (133 Sounds)

LONG LENGTHS  6 to 26 Seconds Long (23 Sounds)


Number of Audio Waves: 417

Number of Audio Cues: 417

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 28:33

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
